Text: The Young And The Restless is pre-empted today (09-09-2011) as CBS will air US Open Tennis. The show will return with a new episode on Monday September 12

This "pre-empting" must really annoy the daytime viewers who otherwise couldn't give a tinker's cuss about the tennis. Anyway, don't you guys have dedicated sports channels? If so, how come it can't be shown on it?
